mapper.select: SELECT t1.meeting_schedule_detail_id, t1.meeting_date, t1.meeting_time, t2.meeting_company_id, t2.company_id, t2.join_amount, t2.company_request FROM m_meeting_schedule_detail t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN t_meeting_company t2 ON t2.meeting_schedule_detail_id = t1.meeting_schedule_detail_id AND t2.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} WHERE t1.meeting_schedule_id = #{meetingScheduleId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t1.meeting_schedule_detail_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_meeting_schedule_detail ( meeting_schedule_id, meeting_date, meeting_time, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{meetingScheduleId}, #{meetingDate}, #{meetingTime}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
